name: Accepta® Showersperse
description: Accepta® Showersperse is a high-performance cleaner and descaler with indicator dye, scientifically formulated for the regular cleaning of showers and shower heads. Achieving superior results where performance is critical, Accepta® Showersperse is ideal use as part of a Legionella control program for the cleaning of showers and shower heads. The fast acting, powerful formulation contains a blend of highly effective acids and dispersants to ensure the efficient removal of calcium and magnesium carbonate scale as well as microbiologial deposits and biofilms, ensuring optimum water flow through the showerhead.
